entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 2:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -3.2°C
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to freezing rain or ice pellets late in the morning then to rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
